content.prompt: Which of the following is the most accurate comparison of each authorâ€™s overall view of the French Revolution?

choices.label: Both Barzun and Thatcher view the French Revolution positively.
Both Barzun and Thatcher view the French Revolution negatively.
Barzun views the French Revolution positively, while Thatcher views it negatively.
Barzun views the French Revolution negatively, while Thatcher views it positively.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century
